name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Learn the fundamentals of computer science and programming.

name: General Biology
description: Explore the basics of cellular biology, genetics, and evolution.

name: Calculus I
description: An introduction to differential and integral calculus.

name: World History
description: A survey of global historical events and their impact on society.

name: Psychology 101
description: Understand human behavior through psychological theories and experiments.

name: Physics for Engineers
description: Mechanics, waves, and thermodynamics tailored for engineering students.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: Study the structure, properties, and reactions of organic compounds.

name: English Literature
description: Examine major works of English literature from various time periods.

name: Microeconomics
description: Analyze individual economic decision-making and market behavior.

name: Ethics in Philosophy
description: Explore moral philosophy and ethical reasoning in historical and modern contexts.
